it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.icmp4

Class DirectPingClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.icmp4.DirectPingClient

  • public class DirectPingClient
extends java.lang.Object
    PING client. It sends ICMP Echo Request messages to a remote node and captures possible ICMP Echo Reply messages.

    it is implemented directly on top of the Ip4Layer without getting the IcmpLayer from the Ip4Layer.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long CLEARING_TIME
      Time waited before ending [milliseconds]

      • DirectPingClient

        public DirectPingClient(Ip4Layer ip_layer,
                        Ip4Address target_ip_addr,
                        int count,
                        java.io.PrintStream out)
        Creates a runs a ping session.
        Parameters:
        ip_layer - IP layer
        target_ip_addr - IP address of the target node
        count - the number of ICMP Echo requests to be sent
        out - output where ping results are printed

      • DirectPingClient

        public DirectPingClient(Ip4Layer ip_layer,
                        int echo_id,
                        byte[] echo_data,
                        Ip4Address target_ip_addr,
                        int count,
                        long ping_time,
                        java.io.PrintStream out)
        Creates a runs a ping session.
        Parameters:
        ip_layer - IP layer
        echo_id - identifier in the ICMP Echo request
        echo_data - payload data in the ICMP Echo request
        target_ip_addr - IP address of the target node
        count - the number of ICMP Echo requests to be sent
        ping_time - ping period time
        out - output where ping results are printed
